Warn.Timeout.Message: Web service request timed out, you can increase the timeout or try after some time
Error.SecurityContextNotAvailable.Messag: User credentials are not available at this moment. You can contact the administrator to verify the credentials.
Warn.SecurityContextInvalid.Message: Your current credentials are not accessible. Your preferred credentials will be used instead. You can verify credentials in widget preferences.
Error.ServiceNotFound.Message: The {service} Service is not accessible. You can contact the administrator if the problem persists.
